alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 6:58PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, northwestern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 745 PM EST... At 658 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dowling Park to 17 miles northwest of Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Steinhatchee, Pinland, Tennille, Jug Island, Clara, Buckville, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Salem, San Pedro Junction, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Howell Place, Chancey, Smith, Carbur and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
